column1: You are given a set of words and asked to pick (use * to denote) one of the options based one simple rule:  if you saw that word in a sentence (any sentence), which language between Italian and Sicilian would that sentence most likely come from?

Final Question: from all these Italina/Sicilian words that you have selected in this experiment, what are some things in common? What are some common lingustic features that you can observe amount these words?
